name: Trapped (itch) (Smash Studios)
description:
Trapped  is an early game prototype.  It is a 2D, shooter, survival, horror game that seats currently at it's pre-alpha stage and it's being developed by one person on a custom engine.

Plot: You are a hunter that has been tasked to identify suspicious activities in the national park, like the disappearance of a group of high schoolers. Some locals speculate that these actions might be caused due to Cronost a local myth of an omnivore monster, that few have witnessed to have seen. Gather resources, set up your equipment, survive and kill the monster.

Updates and Feedback: I will upload news and devlogs of the game each time I add new content to it. You can see the process live and feel that you are part of the development by requesting new features, in the comments, that you belive will make the game more interesting! By donating you help me get motivated and work more intensively to the game!

  • Watch devlogs on my chanel on YouTube
  • Visit my game studio website
  • Support me on Patreon
